import { useState } from 'react' import './ItemCard.css' export const ItemCard = ( { category, id, thumbnail, title, brand, price, rating } ) =>{ //console.log(category, id, img, title, brand, price, rating) const [productPage, setProductPage] = useState() const [productPageIsOpen, setProductPageOpen] = useState(false) const handleRemove = (id) =>{ console.log(id) productPage(id) } return(
handleRemove(id)}>

{category}

{title}

{brand}

R$: {price},00

Avaliação: {rating}

) }
